NK050(wi)004:1: // rgyal bstan 'khor lo gsum dgongs pa gcig tu rtogs pa rton pa bzhi ldan gyi gtam bzhugs so //
NK050(wi)004:3: de la byis pa blo dman pa dbang rtul gzung
NK050(wi)004:4: 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa rnams la rnam pa
NK050(wi)004:5: kun tu rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul mi bslu bar
NK050(wi)004:6: bstan nas blang dor dka' thub la brten pa ltar
NK050(wi)004:7: go ba dman 'bring mchog gi gdul bya'i rim pas
NK050(wi)004:8: bzhag pa'i tshe 'khor lo dang po dang /
NK050(wi)004:9: blo rab tu gyur pa dbang rnon gzung 'dzin gyi
NK050(wi)004:10: spros pas 'ching bar mi nus pa rnams la rten
NK050(wi)004:11: cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kun gyi gnas lugs
NK050(wi)004:12: rjen pa zab mo stong pa nyid kyi tshul du
NK050(wi)004:13: gtan la phab nas bstan pa ltar go ba 'khor
NK050(wi)004:15: blo yang rab tu gyur cing shin tu dbang rnon
NK050(wi)004:16: gyi gdul bya rnams la mchog tu zab pa'i stong
NK050(wi)004:17: nyid don dam bden pa bde bar gshegs pa'i snying
NK050(wi)004:18: po sku dang ye shes sogs yon tan thams cad
NK050(wi)004:19: kyi rten du gdod nas yongs grub chen por spros
NK050(wi)004:20: pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral bar bzhugs pa'i tshul
NK050(wi)004:21: rgyas par ston pa ltar go ba 'khor lo tha
NK050(wi)004:22: ma ste / 'khor lo de gsum char yang gdul
NK050(wi)004:23: bya'i blo dman 'bring mchog gi dbye bas go tshul
NK050(wi)004:24: tha dad byung ba yin mod kyi bde bar gshegs
NK050(wi)004:25: pas chos bstan pa ni rnam pa kun tu tha
NK050(wi)004:26: dad par mi bsam pa gnad che shos so //
NK050(wi)004:27: yang gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo
NK050(wi)004:28: lung ltar gang zag gcig gi blo rim sbyong la
NK050(wi)004:29: ltos na'ang 'khor lo gsum gyi dgongs pa 'gal ba
NK050(wi)004:31: las dang po pa'i gdul bya gang zhig thog mar
NK050(wi)004:32: kun rdzob tu rgyu 'bras bden yod ltar blang dor
NK050(wi)004:33: spang gnyen gyis kha drang zhing /
NK050(wi)004:34: thog ma nas stong nyid sgra ji bzhin par bstan
NK050(wi)004:35: na skabs 'di'i gdul bya blo stobs chung bas zhum
NK050(wi)004:36: zhing skrag nas zab mo'i chos spang bar 'gyur ba'i
NK050(wi)004:37: nyes pa gzigs nas bdag gnyis kyis dben pa'i sgras
NK050(wi)004:38: stong nyid phyogs tsam rtogs pas bdag lta'i zhen pa
NK050(wi)004:40: 'khor lo bar bar dang por bstan pa'i kun rdzob
NK050(wi)004:41: rgyu 'bras spros chos de thams cad gdod nas bden
NK050(wi)004:42: par yod ma myong ba'i spros bral gyi mtshan nyid
NK050(wi)004:43: yin lugs ltar ji bzhin par rnam thar sgo gsum
NK050(wi)004:44: gyi sdom du bsdus pa'i stong nyid rtogs par mdzad
NK050(wi)004:45: nas / 'khor lo tha mas bshad ma thag pa
NK050(wi)004:46: ltar bar pa'i mngon zhen zlog byed ni gnyen po'i
NK050(wi)004:47: stong nyid tsam las ma gsungs pa de nyid rgyu
NK050(wi)004:48: rkyen 'dus byas kyi khams su mi gnas shing rang
NK050(wi)004:49: bzhin 'pho 'gyur bral ba'i rtag brtan yongs grub chen
NK050(wi)004:50: po mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi
NK050(wi)004:51: 'char gzhi'i ye shes don dam par bden pa spros
NK050(wi)004:52: pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'khor
NK050(wi)004:53: 'das thams cad la khyab gdal du gyur pa la
NK050(wi)004:54: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'i sgras btags pa chos
NK050(wi)004:55: nyid de bzhin nyid gya nom pa gzhi lam 'bras
NK050(wi)004:56: bu'i tshul gyis nyams myong mngon sum du bstan pa
NK050(wi)004:57: de tsam gyis rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yin lugs nges
NK050(wi)004:58: don mthar thug pa'i gnad zab cing rgya che ba'i
NK050(wi)004:59: gnas mtha' dag rdzogs par gdams khyad par dang de
NK050(wi)004:60: ltar bstan pa'i dgos pa khyad par can yang shes
NK050(wi)004:61: nas / dgos te / rgyal tshab byams pas /
NK050(wi)004:62: sngar ma brjod dang lhan cig byung //
NK050(wi)004:63: yod dang med dang yod nyid dang //
NK050(wi)004:64: zhes pa la sogs kyi rig pa dang /
NK050(wi)004:65: tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya nom chos //
NK050(wi)004:66: klan ka mi btsal mdo tsam bsnyad par bya //
NK050(wi)004:67: zhes sogs kyis rtsod med du grub pa'i lung don blang pa la mkhas par bya dgos so //
NK050(wi)004:68: de lta bas na rim pa gsum po de rnams
NK050(wi)004:69: la mi zab pa dang zab pa dang ches zab
NK050(wi)004:70: pa'i khyad par tsam ni yod de /
NK050(wi)004:71: bka' dang pos don dam bden pa mthong rung du
NK050(wi)004:72: bsgrubs shing bar pas don dam bden pa rnam grangs
NK050(wi)004:73: tsam dang tha mas don dam bden pa yin lugs
NK050(wi)004:74: ji lta bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)004:75: gang dag rim pa gsum po de rnams kyis mtha'
NK050(wi)004:76: gcig tu grub mtha' tha dad ston par 'dod dang
NK050(wi)004:77: drang nges go ldog tu smra ba rnams kyis ni
NK050(wi)004:78: dgongs pa ji bzhin ma longs te /
NK050(wi)004:79: mya ngan 'das pa bden gcig pu zhes pa dang /
NK050(wi)004:80: sangs rgyas gnyis su med gsung ba //
NK050(wi)004:81: zhes pa 'di tsam la'ang go ba gsha' ma ma skyes par snang ngo //
NK050(wi)004:84: sangs rgyas pa la bzhi pa dang //
NK050(wi)004:85: lnga pa thub pa'i dgongs pa min //
NK050(wi)004:86: zhes theg pa gsum dang grub mtha' bzhi bstan pas
NK050(wi)004:87: gnod do zhe na de ni skabs 'ga' zhig la
NK050(wi)004:88: dgongs nas gsungs kyi rnam pa kun tu ma yin
NK050(wi)004:89: te / gnas skabs theg pa gsum dang mthar thug
NK050(wi)004:90: theg pa gcig kho nar bzhed pa rgyal ba sras
NK050(wi)004:91: bcas kyi dgongs par nges pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)004:92: rgyu mtshan de nyid kyi phyir bka' snga ma gnyis kyi dgongs pa phyi mar gcig pa'i tshul yang /
NK050(wi)004:93: phyir mi ldog pas 'khor lo'i mdo las //
NK050(wi)004:94: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs snyan pas gsol ba /
NK050(wi)004:95: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa mthun lags sam /
NK050(wi)004:96: rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni mthun no //
NK050(wi)004:97: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ci tsam zhig mthun bka' stsal pa /
NK050(wi)004:98: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lor mthun no //
NK050(wi)004:99: zhes rgya cher gsungs pa'i don blang par bya'o //
NK050(wi)004:100: de lta bu'i dgongs pa de 'grel pa la rgyal
NK050(wi)004:101: ba'i lung bstan pa'i slob dpon ni 'phags pa klu
NK050(wi)004:102: sgrub dang thogs med gnyis yin cing snga mas 'khor
NK050(wi)004:103: lo dang po'i cha 'grel pa gtam gyi tshogs dang
NK050(wi)004:104: bar pa'i dgongs 'grel rigs pa'i tshogs drug dang tha
NK050(wi)004:105: ma'i dgongs 'grel bstod pa'i tshogs dang /
NK050(wi)004:106: theg chen nyi shu pa dang /
NK050(wi)004:108: srid pa 'pho ba sogs kyis rim pa gsum gyi dgongs don gsal bar mdzad la /
NK050(wi)004:109: slob dpon 'dis bka' phyi ma gnyis kyi dgongs don
NK050(wi)004:110: 'grel pa na grub mtha' tha dad pa gnyis ston
NK050(wi)004:111: par mdzad do // zhes mkhas rlom dag smra bar
NK050(wi)004:112: byed pa ni shin tu mi rigs pa'i gtam chen
NK050(wi)004:113: par mdzad do // po ste / de ltar na
NK050(wi)004:114: slob dpon gyis rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin ma
NK050(wi)004:116: sde pa bco brgyad ltar tha dad du bklags pas gdul byar nem nur bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)004:117: 'on kyang so so'i dgongs pa rang thad du 'grel
NK050(wi)004:118: pa'i tshe gzhung de dang de'i brjod bya gtso bor
NK050(wi)004:119: byas nas gzhan dang ma 'dres ma bslad par 'chad
NK050(wi)004:120: pa ni mkhas pa rnams la grags shing grub la
NK050(wi)004:121: / de tsam gyis dgongs pa tha dad du 'gyur
NK050(wi)004:122: zhing de dang de'i grub mtha' kho na la rtsis
NK050(wi)004:123: su byed nas gzhan 'gog pa yin na slob dpon
NK050(wi)004:124: gyis nyan thos kyi sde sdod bshad pas theg dman
NK050(wi)004:126: de bas na gsung rab kyi dbyings 'jal ba'i mchog
NK050(wi)004:127: tu zab pa'i bstan pa'i sgro ma tsho ba la
NK050(wi)004:128: mi mkhas bzhin du gzhung lugs re re'i brjod bya'i
NK050(wi)004:129: dbang du btang nas 'di ni grub mtha' 'di kho
NK050(wi)004:130: na'o // slob dpon 'di yang grub mtha' 'di kho
NK050(wi)004:131: na la dgyes kyi gzhan la ma yin no zhes
NK050(wi)004:132: sgrogs shing stangs gcod pa'ang bstan pa la phan pa'i
NK050(wi)004:134: de bas na bka' rim pa gsum car sngar smos
NK050(wi)004:135: pa'i rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bzhin grub mtha' gcig las
NK050(wi)004:136: gnyis sam gsum ni rnam pa kun tu slob dpon
NK050(wi)004:139: bka' dang pos phyogs tsam mthong ba'i stong nyid de
NK050(wi)004:140: zab cing rgya che bar bar pas dgag phyogs nas
NK050(wi)004:141: bstan pa dang tha mas sgrub phyogs nas bstan pa
NK050(wi)004:142: gnyis la khyad par med de snga mas spros bral
NK050(wi)004:143: stong nyid tsam las ma bstan pa de'i dgos pa
NK050(wi)004:144: ma lus can rnams kyi blo lhan skyes kyi ngar
NK050(wi)004:145: 'dzin bzlog dka' ba'i mtshan 'dzin sel ba'i ched du
NK050(wi)004:146: phyi mas de lta bu'i stong nyid de bsam gyis
NK050(wi)004:147: mi khyab pa'i chos nyid yon tan thams cad kyi
NK050(wi)004:148: 'char gzhir gdod nas lhun grub tu bzhugs pa yin
NK050(wi)004:149: lugs ltar bstan pa'i nyams myong rjen par ngo 'phrod
NK050(wi)004:150: pa'i dgos pa ji lta bar mkhyen nas rig tshogs
NK050(wi)004:151: dang bstod tshogs su gtan la phab nas bshad pa'i
NK050(wi)004:152: phyir ro // gal te rig tshogs kyis rang stong
NK050(wi)004:153: dang bstod tshogs kyis gzhan stong bstan no zhes smra
NK050(wi)004:154: na de yin du chug kyang des grub mtha' tha
NK050(wi)004:155: dad du mi 'gyur te kun rdzob la ltos nas
NK050(wi)004:156: rang stong dang don dam la ltos nas gzhan stong
NK050(wi)004:157: bstan cing snga mas sgro skur spros mtshan gyi skyon
NK050(wi)004:158: spangs nas phyi mas de nyid snying po'i ye shes
NK050(wi)004:159: su rgyas par phye ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro
NK050(wi)004:160: phyir ro // // slob dpon thogs med kyis bka'
NK050(wi)004:161: snga ma gnyis kyi dgongs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i
NK050(wi)004:162: 'khor lo gcig pa'i gnad ji lta bar mkhyen bzhin
NK050(wi)004:163: du rje btsun byams pa'i lung la brten nas bka'
NK050(wi)004:164: tha ma'i tshul gsal zhing rgyas par mdzad mod /
NK050(wi)004:165: de'i tshe byams pa dang thog med kyi gzhung de
NK050(wi)004:166: dang des grub mtha' de mi ston bzhin du 'di
NK050(wi)004:167: dag sems tsam pa'o zhes smra ba ni don ston
NK050(wi)004:168: pa'i rgyal ba sras bcas la skur pa gdab pa'i
NK050(wi)004:169: gtam ham po che yin te /
NK050(wi)004:170: de lta na 'khor lo tha ma'i bka' thams cad kyis sems tsam bstan par 'gyur zhing /
NK050(wi)004:171: klu sgrub kyang sems tsam bzhed par thal te bstod
NK050(wi)004:172: tshogs sogs kyis don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro
NK050(wi)004:173: // gzhan yang dang pos drang don /
NK050(wi)004:175: tha mas slar yang drang don bzlas te bstan pa la dgos pa ci yod bsam dgos shing /
NK050(wi)004:176: dbang po'i rim pa dkri ba'i tshul dang /
NK050(wi)004:177: mi zab pa dang zab pa dang shin tu zab
NK050(wi)004:178: pa'i go rim dag kyang 'khrugs par 'gyur la der
NK050(wi)004:179: ma zad 'phags pa thogs med kyis drang nges ji
NK050(wi)004:180: bzhin ma phye bar 'gyur te tha ma nges don
NK050(wi)004:181: mthar thug tu bzhed pa'i phyir dang drang nges 'byed
NK050(wi)004:182: pa re rgyal ba'i lung bstan pa'ang don gyis dben
NK050(wi)004:183: par 'gyur ro // spyir sems tsam ni klu sgrub
NK050(wi)004:184: ma byon pa'i snga rol du slob dpon 'ga' zhig
NK050(wi)004:185: gis mdo'i dgongs pa ji bzhin ma longs pa'am dgos
NK050(wi)004:186: dbang ngam gang ltar na theg chen du 'dod pa'i
NK050(wi)004:187: grub mtha' 'di byas pa yin la /
NK050(wi)004:188: klu sgrub byon nas lugs de nub cing bka' phyi
NK050(wi)004:189: ma gnyis kyi dgongs pa theg pa chen po'i lug
NK050(wi)004:190: srol khyab gdal du mdzad nas ring zhig lon pa
NK050(wi)004:191: na slob dpon thogs med byon nas slar yang bka'
NK050(wi)004:192: tha ma'i dgongs pa ches gsal bar mdzad pa'i slob
NK050(wi)004:193: dpon 'dis sems tsam ston pa'i khungs med pa dus
NK050(wi)004:194: snga phyis kyang shes sla mod /
NK050(wi)004:195: gal te rgyal tshab ma pham pa chen pos dngos
NK050(wi)004:196: por smra ba'i grub mtha' ston par mdzad do zhes
NK050(wi)004:197: smra na blo gzu bor gnas pa rnams kyis ji
NK050(wi)004:199: spyir sems kyi sgra tsam bstan pas der 'khrul par mi bya ste /
NK050(wi)004:201: sems la sems ma mchis te sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba'o //
NK050(wi)004:202: zhes 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems bstan pa lta
NK050(wi)004:203: bur bka' rim pa gsum car du 'byung zhing rgyal
NK050(wi)004:204: ba rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje'i sems dang /
NK050(wi)004:208: gnyug ma'i sems sogs rnam grangs du mas gsungs pa
NK050(wi)004:209: rnams sems tsam du 'dod dgos na ha cang thal
NK050(wi)004:210: lo // yang slob dpon skal ldan gyis dbu ma
NK050(wi)004:211: phra rags gnyis su phyes nas bka' phyi ma gnyis
NK050(wi)004:212: kyi dgongs pa ltar legs par bshad pas mtshon bka'
NK050(wi)004:213: dang dgongs 'grel de dag gis grub mtha' de mi
NK050(wi)004:214: ston pa ni rang rang gi gzhung zhib mor bklags
NK050(wi)004:215: pas shes par 'gyur zhing spros pas chog go //
NK050(wi)004:216: gsang sngags te rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du
NK050(wi)004:217: ni rgyud gsum gyi rnam gzhag byed pa'i rgyu'i rgyud
NK050(wi)004:218: dang / sbyang gzhi sbyong byed sogs kyi skabs dang /
NK050(wi)004:219: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi nga'am bdag dang /
NK050(wi)004:221: rgyu'i rgyud kyi rten mi shigs pa'i thig le dang /
NK050(wi)004:224: rgyu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs rnam grangs du mas
NK050(wi)004:225: bstan don bka' rim pa gsum ga'i brjod bya'i stong
NK050(wi)004:226: nyid spros bral bde gshegs snying po gzhir bzhag pa'i
NK050(wi)004:227: steng du mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen
NK050(wi)004:228: po'i khyad par dang bcas pa'i bde stong zung 'jug
NK050(wi)004:229: tu bstan la / 'on kyang gzhi'i dus su rgya
NK050(wi)004:230: che ba'i phung khams skye mched kyi dbyings 'jal ba
NK050(wi)004:231: na lam gyi yan lag de snyed du spros pa'i
NK050(wi)004:232: thabs kyi sgo mtha' yas par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)004:233: de yang bde ba dang myur ba dang tshegs med
NK050(wi)004:234: par mthar phyin pas 'bras bu la yun ring mi
NK050(wi)004:235: 'gor bar sbyor ba'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa chen
NK050(wi)004:236: po'i mdo sde 'di la ltos nas rgyu'i theg par
NK050(wi)004:237: bde gshegs snying po gtan la phab pa'ang sa bon
NK050(wi)004:238: tsam mam phyogs mtshon tsam shes dgos so //
NK050(wi)004:239: thabs kyi theg pa 'di bas don dam stong nyid
NK050(wi)004:240: ye shes zung du 'jug par gdod ma'i 'gog bden
NK050(wi)004:241: gyi yon tan sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las
NK050(wi)004:242: lnga'i bdag nyid chen por dbyer med lhun grub tu
NK050(wi)004:243: bzhugs pa dang snang cha rnam dag pa kun rdzob
NK050(wi)004:244: lha'i dkyil 'khor du gdod nas dag pa gnyis zung
NK050(wi)004:245: 'jug dbyer med chen por shes pa'i bden gnyis dbyer
NK050(wi)004:246: med du lta ba la yul du byas nas lam
NK050(wi)004:247: sgom pa nyid khyad par du 'dod pa yin la
NK050(wi)004:248: / rgyu'i theg chen du bshad pa'i don dam la
NK050(wi)004:249: bde ba chen po'i khyad par ma tshang zhing kun
NK050(wi)004:250: rdzob bden pas stong pa tsam las lha'i dkyil 'khor
NK050(wi)004:252: de ma gsungs pas chos sku la bde ba chen po'i sku ma bstan cing /
NK050(wi)004:253: longs sku la kha sbyor sogs kyi yan lag ma tshang /
NK050(wi)004:254: sprul sku la'ang dkar nag gi phyogs gnyis ka 'dul
NK050(wi)004:255: ba'i thabs med cing spyi tsam gyi gzugs sku gnyis
NK050(wi)004:256: kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis snang ba
NK050(wi)004:257: tsam las de thob byed kyi lam mtshan nyid pa
NK050(wi)004:258: ma bstan / de ma bstan pas sbyin sogs phar
NK050(wi)004:259: phyin drug gi tshogs bsags bskal pa grangs med gsum
NK050(wi)004:260: sogs kyi mtha' la re ltos 'cha' dgos pa de
NK050(wi)004:261: ma bstan / byung / theg pa 'di pas kun
NK050(wi)004:262: rdzob cha bcas dag pa'i lag rjes rang snang dang
NK050(wi)004:263: gzhan snang gi gzugs sku gnyis zhing dang bcas pa
NK050(wi)004:264: snang bar bzhed cing de ltar shes pas lam rim
NK050(wi)004:265: pa gnyis la goms pas skad cig re la'ang tshogs
NK050(wi)004:266: chen grangs med bzlums nas mthar phyin pa la myur
NK050(wi)004:267: du 'gro bas khyad par du 'phags pa yin la
NK050(wi)004:268: ma bstan / byung / / phyis kyi chen po
NK050(wi)004:269: 'ga' zhig gsang sngags pa'i bden gnyis dbyer med kyi
NK050(wi)004:270: lta ba de la kun rdzogs kyi ldog pa de
NK050(wi)004:271: sgom pa'i skabs su sbyor gyi lta bar mi rung
NK050(wi)004:272: ngo zer zhing mdo sngags gnyis kyi khyad par yang
NK050(wi)004:273: cho ga tsam gyis phye ba'i lugs su byed par
NK050(wi)004:274: ma bstan / byung / / snang ngo // de
NK050(wi)004:275: tsam gyis dbye bar mi nus pa bshad ma thag
NK050(wi)004:276: pas kyang shes par 'gyur la spyir lta ba zhes
NK050(wi)004:277: pa bya tshig yin zhing de'i yul gdod ma'i gnas
NK050(wi)004:278: lugs ma 'khrul pa zhig tu 'jog cing shes rab
NK050(wi)004:279: kyis de la nan tan du goms su 'jug pas
NK050(wi)004:280: glo bur gyi dri ma sbyong ba'i thabs la sgom
NK050(wi)004:281: pa zhes btags pa yin na /
NK050(wi)004:282: skabs 'dir yang kun rdzob gdod nas dag pa lha'i
NK050(wi)004:283: dkyil 'khor du gnas pa de la lta ba'am yul
NK050(wi)004:284: du byas nas rnam pa la ma byed kyi bskyed
NK050(wi)004:285: rim bsgoms shing goms pas glo bur pa'i sgrib byed
NK050(wi)004:286: gnyis snang gi bag chags rnams rim gyis nub nas
NK050(wi)004:287: gdod nas dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mi zad rgyan gyi
NK050(wi)004:288: 'khor lo yin lugs ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i
NK050(wi)004:289: phyir lta ba yin la lta don sgom pa'ang ji
NK050(wi)004:290: bzhin yin zhing / de skabs nyid na'ang 'bras bu'i
NK050(wi)004:291: rnam pa lam du byed pas 'bras bu'i theg par
NK050(wi)004:292: rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa yin la /
NK050(wi)004:293: cang med pa'i stong pa yin na bsgoms pas der
NK050(wi)004:294: mi 'gyur te ri bong gi rwa dang mo gsham
NK050(wi)004:296: de lta bur bzhed pa'i rgyu ni sngar smos pa
NK050(wi)004:297: ltar 'khor lo bar pa'i bstan don rig tshogs kyi
NK050(wi)004:298: dgongs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul du bzhugs
NK050(wi)004:299: pas bdag tu lta ba dang spros pa'i mtshan ma
NK050(wi)004:300: thams cad sel ba yin zhing /
NK050(wi)004:301: de la brten nas phyis kyi mkhas pa mang po
NK050(wi)004:302: zhig gis lta sgom gyi gnad thams cad sngon dang
NK050(wi)004:303: cung zad mi mthun par bcos shing rtog ge'i rig
NK050(wi)004:304: pas dpyad pa'i stong nyid kho na rtsal du bton
NK050(wi)004:305: zhing rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang gi dgongs pa thun
NK050(wi)004:306: mong ma yin pa'i gsang tshig 'chad pa'i skabs su'ang
NK050(wi)004:307: dpyad stong la gnas lugs su bzhed pa snyan rgyud
NK050(wi)004:308: dang sgrub rgyud kyi rten 'brel zab mo rnams dang
NK050(wi)004:309: cung zad mi mtshungs te de pa'i lugs su man
NK050(wi)004:310: ngag gi dgongs pa nyams myong byin rlabs kyi brgyud
NK050(wi)004:311: pa gtso bor byed pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)004:312: lar gsang sngags kyi dngos grub ni rang gi skal
NK050(wi)004:313: pa dang mos gus bla ma'i byin rlabs 'dzoms pas
NK050(wi)004:314: rgyud thog mar grol ba nas bzung lta sgom spyod
NK050(wi)004:315: pa'i gnad thams cad bla ma ye shes can gyis
NK050(wi)004:316: ji ltar bstan pa'i don de kho nar nyams su
NK050(wi)004:317: blangs pas thob pa yin gyi /
NK050(wi)004:318: mtha' gcig tu gzhung lugs la sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa zhig med ka med kyang min te /
NK050(wi)004:320: gang du brjod min lhan cig skyes //
NK050(wi)004:321: nam du yang ni rnyed min te //
NK050(wi)004:322: bla ma'i dus thabs man ngag dang //
NK050(wi)004:323: bdag gi bsod nams las shes bya //
NK050(wi)004:326: nyin bzhin bram ze gsod pa dang //
NK050(wi)004:327: mtshams med lnga na byed pa dang //
NK050(wi)004:328: chom kun las kyi longs spyod pa'ang //
NK050(wi)004:330: sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)004:331: zhes bstan pas shes par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)004:332: 'phags pa'i yul gyi grub pa mchog rnams kyi rnam
NK050(wi)004:333: thar gyis kyang shes par nus shing bod du'ang rnying
NK050(wi)004:334: ma bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sgo nas grub pa thob
NK050(wi)004:335: pa rnams dang / phyis kyi lam 'bras pa 'ga' dang /
NK050(wi)004:336: sngon gyi jo zhal mkhas grub rnams dang /
NK050(wi)004:337: mar mi dwags gsum gyi bka' brgyud rin po che sngon byon thams cad kyang de dang mtshungs la /
NK050(wi)004:338: da lta'i sngags pa rnams tshig tsam gyi gsang sngags
NK050(wi)004:339: ni sgrogs la don po'i lta sgom spyod pa rnams
NK050(wi)004:340: med nas da yun ring por song ba yin no
NK050(wi)004:341: // de lta mod kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa mtha'
NK050(wi)004:342: dag lung rtogs gnyis kyi sdom du bsdus pa'i rtogs
NK050(wi)004:343: pa ni bstan pa'i don por grub cing /
NK050(wi)004:344: de nyid sgrub pa nyams len gyis gtan la phab
NK050(wi)004:345: cing mngon du bya ba'i sgrub pa de'ang mdo sngags
NK050(wi)004:346: gnyis las phyi ma bstan pa mtha' dag gi snying
NK050(wi)004:347: po nyid du nges pa gting nas tshugs pa'i sh+aakya'i
NK050(wi)004:348: bstan pa 'dir grub pa thob pa nas drod tsam
NK050(wi)004:350: tha na byin rlab phra mo tsam zhig byung ba'ang
NK050(wi)004:351: gsang sngags kyi nus pa yin na 'di la rig
NK050(wi)004:352: pa ltar snang gis dpyad pa'i rgyas 'gebs sogs blo
NK050(wi)004:353: lhan skyes kyi bzo bcos du ma'i bslad mi gzhug
NK050(wi)004:354: par rdo rje 'chang dang grub brnyes rnams kyi zhal
NK050(wi)004:355: lung dri ma med pa sgra ji bzhin par lag
NK050(wi)004:356: len du 'debs pa snyigs ma'i rnam 'gyur gyi 'og
NK050(wi)004:357: nas ldang bar dka' yang mos pa lam byed tsam
NK050(wi)004:358: byas na'ang don chen po dang ldan pa nyid du
NK050(wi)004:359: shes par bya'o // zhes pa 'di yang 'khor lo
NK050(wi)004:360: gsum brjod bya gong mar gcig par bstan pa'i gnad
NK050(wi)004:361: cung zad rang gi yid la nges pa rnams rgyal
NK050(wi)004:362: khams pa tshe dbang mchog grub kyis skabs babs su
NK050(wi)004:363: brjod pa 'gro ba rnams bstan pa thams cad gcig
NK050(wi)004:364: pa'i dbyings 'jal ba la mkhas par gyur cig //
NK050(wi)004:366: bde gshegs snying po'i bstan pa seng ge'i sgras //
NK050(wi)004:367: lta ngan ri dwags mtha' dag skrag mdzad cing //
NK050(wi)004:368: sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mthar thugs gsal mdzad pa'i //
NK050(wi)004:369: mtshungs med bla ma rnams la snying nas 'dud //
NK050(wi)004:370: skyon bral rgyal ba'i bstan pa'i sgo ji snyed //
NK050(wi)004:371: ma lus blo yi byi dor kho na ste //
NK050(wi)004:372: kun kyang nges don gcig gi lam stegs dang //
NK050(wi)004:373: mthar thug 'bras bu gcig tu dkri ba'i thabs //
NK050(wi)004:374: 'di na rgyal ba'i chos 'khor rim gsum gyis //
NK050(wi)004:375: dang pos kun rdzob rgyu bcas bslu med dang //
NK050(wi)004:376: gnyis pas kun rdzob rang stong gsum pa yis //
NK050(wi)004:377: don dam gzhan stong chos nyid zab mo bstan //
NK050(wi)004:378: yul gyi 'khrul snang med bzhin kun tu btags //
NK050(wi)004:379: yul can 'khrul sems tshogs brgyad gzhan dbang las //
NK050(wi)004:380: rnam grol rig pa'i ye shes yongs grub che //
NK050(wi)004:381: 'di ni nges don rdzogs chen khyad par chos //
NK050(wi)004:382: gshis kyi bzhug tshul 'khor lo tha ma ru //
NK050(wi)004:383: phyogs tsam bstan nas zab gsal gnyis med don //
NK050(wi)004:384: shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde'i gzhung //
NK050(wi)004:385: rig 'dzin sde snod nyid du gsal bar bstan //
NK050(wi)004:386: de las sngon gyi slob dpon 'ga' zhig gis //
NK050(wi)004:387: sngags kyi nges par ma brten dgos dbang gis //
NK050(wi)004:388: mdo lung tsam la brten nas bkram pa las //
NK050(wi)004:389: rnam rig smra ba'i grub mthar 'dod pa'ang byung //
NK050(wi)004:390: sems dang sems byung kun rtog chu bo'i klung //
NK050(wi)004:391: blo yis dkrugs pa'i stong nyid chu bur dang //
NK050(wi)004:392: rnam shes tsam la yong sa grub gnas ma yin //
NK050(wi)004:393: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ste //
NK050(wi)004:394: lam bden 'dus byas khams la'ang de mi gnas //
NK050(wi)004:395: gang dag rig pas dpyad pa'i dbu ma pa'i //
NK050(wi)004:396: spros bral nam mkha' lta bu'i stong nyid kyang //
NK050(wi)004:397: stong pa nyid du snyam byed blo yin phyir //
NK050(wi)004:398: nam yang spros pa'i mtha' las 'da' ba med //
NK050(wi)004:399: 'dir ni tshogs brgyad sems kyi sprin rum las //
NK050(wi)004:400: rnam par grol ba'i rig dngos nyi ma bzhin //
NK050(wi)004:401: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul la //
NK050(wi)004:402: rgyal ba kun gyis gzigs pa'i de kho na //
NK050(wi)004:403: 'di yis kun brtags rang gi ngo bos stong //
NK050(wi)004:404: rnam shes gzhan dbang skye ba med pas stong //
NK050(wi)004:405: yongs grub rig pa don dam ngo bos stong //
NK050(wi)004:406: stong pa'i tshul 'di don dam yang dag mtha' //
NK050(wi)004:407: 'phags pa rnams kyi bden mthong ye shes dang //
NK050(wi)004:408: rjes mthun rnal 'byor rnams la rig pa'i cha //
NK050(wi)004:409: lus can rnams la snying po'i tshul du bzhugs //
NK050(wi)004:410: gnas skabs gsum yang blo yi dri mas phye //
NK050(wi)004:411: gang tshe sgrib kun spang ba'i ye shes las //
NK050(wi)004:412: sku dang zhing sogs bsam mi khyab pa'i gzhir //
NK050(wi)004:413: snang yang rdul dang shes sogs mtshan ma'i chos //
NK050(wi)004:414: tshig dang sgra rtog blo yi mdun mi gnas //
NK050(wi)004:415: 'dus byas las 'das rtag mthar lhung ma myong //
NK050(wi)004:416: chos kun rang bzhin gnas lugs gzhan rkyen las //
NK050(wi)004:417: ma byung gzhan du 'pho zhing 'gyur med pas //
NK050(wi)004:418: 'jig rten las 'das sku dang ye shes kyi //
NK050(wi)004:419: 'char gzhir bzhugs pas chad mthar lhung ma myong //
NK050(wi)004:420: de phyir gdod nas grub pa'i gnas lugs de //
NK050(wi)004:421: sems can rnams la shin tu lkog gyur gnas //
NK050(wi)004:422: blo chen rnams kyi cha shas tsam mthong ste //
NK050(wi)004:423: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su rdzogs par gzigs //
NK050(wi)004:424: de ni gnas tshul yin gyi snang tshul min //
NK050(wi)004:425: gdod nas yod ma myong ba'i 'khrul snang chos //
NK050(wi)004:426: sems can rnams la mngon sum 'dzin bcas snang //
NK050(wi)004:427: 'phags pa rnams la res 'ga' tsam du ste //
NK050(wi)004:428: 'phags mchog rnams kyis gtan du mi gzigs so //
NK050(wi)004:429: de ni snang tshul yin gyi gnas tshul min //
NK050(wi)004:430: de phyir rnam shes ye shes khyad par dang //
NK050(wi)004:431: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sems dang rig pa dang //
NK050(wi)004:432: chos dang chos nyid kun rdzob don dam dang //
NK050(wi)004:433: gnas tshul snang tshul ma 'khrul rtogs pa ni //
NK050(wi)004:434: rgyal ba kun gyi gzhung lam chen po'i phul //
NK050(wi)004:435: gang dag sems las 'das pa'i rig pa ni //
NK050(wi)004:436: tshogs brgyad nyer len sems kyis ma bsdus shing //
NK050(wi)004:437: yul la 'jug pa'i spros kun nyer zhi bas //
NK050(wi)004:438: dngos po snang bas ma bzung stong pa'i gshis //
NK050(wi)004:439: stong pa rang bzhin gsal ba'i snying po ni //
NK050(wi)004:440: ye shes dag pas mthong thos snom myong dang //
NK050(wi)004:441: ye shes snang ba'i gzugs sogs kun tu yod //
NK050(wi)004:442: tshogs brgyad sems byung rtogs pa kun bral yang //
NK050(wi)004:443: chos nyid rig pa ma 'gags zang thal la //
NK050(wi)004:444: rig pa'i ye shes rnam pa thams cad pa //
NK050(wi)004:445: 'on kyang lam pas phyogs re mthong ba ni //
NK050(wi)004:446: gnas tshul snang tshul 'dres mar 'byung ba'i phyir //
NK050(wi)004:447: gnas tshul rjen pa sangs rgyas kho nas gzigs //
NK050(wi)004:448: de la dmigs pa'i yul can shes ngo la //
NK050(wi)004:449: dri mas bsgribs dang ma bsgribs khyad par las //
NK050(wi)004:450: blo ngor chos nyid dri mas bsgribs ltar snang //
NK050(wi)004:451: ji ltar rang gi steng du sprin byung tshe //
NK050(wi)004:452: ma brtags nyi ma sprin gyis bsgribs so zer //
NK050(wi)004:453: sprin de rlung gis bdas nas mi gnas tshe //
NK050(wi)004:454: nyi ma'i sgrib byed sangs zhes rtogs pa ltar //
NK050(wi)004:455: gang du blo yi dri ma yongs spangs tshe //
NK050(wi)004:456: dri bral sangs rgyas thob ces rgyal bas bstan //
NK050(wi)004:457: de phyir chos nyid ngo bor sgribs tshogs kyis //
NK050(wi)004:458: gos ma myong bas ka nas dag par brjod //
NK050(wi)004:459: spros pa mtha' dag rdzun pa yin pa'i phyir //
NK050(wi)004:460: spros dang bral ba nyid kyis bden par grub //
NK050(wi)004:461: spros bral 'dod la bden grub mi 'dod pa //
NK050(wi)004:462: nyi ma'i 'od zer nyi mar mi 'dod bzhin //
NK050(wi)004:463: rang bzhin 'gyur med 'gro la rtag khyab na //
NK050(wi)004:464: rtag dngos spros par 'gyur snyam de bsal phyir //
NK050(wi)004:465: rgyal bas chos dbyings zab mo stong par gsungs //
NK050(wi)004:466: stong pa de yang nam yang bden med du //
NK050(wi)004:467: ci yang med pa tsam zhig bstan pa min //
NK050(wi)004:468: kun rdzob phyogs nas med dang ma yin stong //
NK050(wi)004:469: don dam phyogs nas rtog pa'i yul gyis stong //
NK050(wi)004:470: don dam ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ltar //
NK050(wi)004:471: gsungs pa'i dgongs pa don dam la dmigs nas //
NK050(wi)004:472: blo yis bzung ltar ma grub pa la dgongs //
NK050(wi)004:473: ye shes rang las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK050(wi)004:474: gzung 'dzin spros kun stong pa'i stong nyid de //
NK050(wi)004:475: myang 'das blo yis zad pa'i stong nyid kyang //
NK050(wi)004:476: gang zag blo yi sgrib pa zad la dgongs //
NK050(wi)004:477: de phyir chos kun stong gzhi'i chos nyid gang //
NK050(wi)004:478: 'phags pa rnams kyi ye shes ma 'khrul pa //
NK050(wi)004:479: nyams su myong bya nyid phyir bden par grub //
NK050(wi)004:480: 'gyur ba med phyir rtag brtan ther zug go //
NK050(wi)004:481: mdor na rgyal bas kun rdzob rang stong la //
NK050(wi)004:482: dgongs nas chos kun ngo bo nyid med gsungs //
NK050(wi)004:483: don dam gzung 'dzin spros pa'i chos gzhan gyis //
NK050(wi)004:484: stong yang ye shes med par bstan pa min //
NK050(wi)004:485: gang la blo yi rim pas 'jal lugs gsum //
NK050(wi)004:486: sems can rnams la gzhi yi tshul du snang //
NK050(wi)004:487: rnal 'byor rnams la lam gyi tshul du snang //
NK050(wi)004:488: dag pa'i 'phags pa rnams la 'bras bur snang //
NK050(wi)004:489: gsum po'ang blo la snang tshul ngos nas bzhag /
NK050(wi)004:490: kun kyang bde gshegs snying po'i ngo bor gcig /
NK050(wi)004:491: blo yi dri mas shin tu lkog gyur dang //
NK050(wi)004:492: cha shas tsam dang yongs rdzogs mthong ba la //
NK050(wi)004:493: gzhi 'bras gnyis su snying po'i sgra yis brjod //
NK050(wi)004:494: lam ni gzhi yi mdangs 'od 'khor ba'i chos //
NK050(wi)004:495: lhan cig 'joms pa de yi gnyen por 'gro //
NK050(wi)004:496: dri ma bral byed dang ni gnas 'gyur byed //
NK050(wi)004:497: thabs tshul sna tshogs lam bden 'dus byas yin //
NK050(wi)004:498: 'di ni blo yi grub mthas ma reg par //
NK050(wi)004:499: rig pa'i shes rab rang byung mnyam gzhag gis //
NK050(wi)004:500: chos nyid gnyug ma'i rang ngo skyong byas na //
NK050(wi)004:501: mthar gyis bden pa'i de nyid mjal bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)004:502: ji srid 'byung ba yod cing rtog pa yod //
NK050(wi)004:503: de srid kun rdzob rgyu 'bras sgyu ma tsam //
NK050(wi)004:504: 'byung phyir drang don thabs kyis rang gzhan rnams //
NK050(wi)004:505: thar bar dkri ba'i tshul kyang 'dor mi bya //
NK050(wi)004:506: rgyal ba sras bcas gsang tshig rmad po che //
NK050(wi)004:507: bde gshegs snying po phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul //
NK050(wi)004:508: mngon byed yang snying myur lam rdzogs pa che'i //
NK050(wi)004:509: gsang ba zab mo skye kun 'dzin gyur cig /
NK050(wi)004:510: nges don mthar thug 'dzin pa mchog rnams kyi //
NK050(wi)004:511: nges don gzhung lugs mjal zhing cung zad myong //
NK050(wi)004:512: nges don snying nas mos pas ma bzod nas //
NK050(wi)004:513: nges don gtam 'di lhun grub steng nas thal //
